name: Catch that chicken!
description:
This is a little game I made in 6 hours to practice.

It features :

  • Chickens
  • A farmer
  • Trees
  • Grass

There's not much into it. Just do what the title says.

Controls

Left Click - Move the farmer to the mouse position
Right Click - Make the farmer perform a roll

Credits

I didn't create this game all by myself, but thanks to : 
Aditya Graphical for the trees;
Nolanfa for the farmer;
Eggy Toast for the music.

Thank you all!
